title: Junior Calls, Pastors, Coachella, Tiger Woods and more.
itunes:title: Junior Calls, Pastors, Coachella, Tiger Woods and more.
description:
It's tax day baby!  Congratulations to Tiger Woods.  Game of Thrones Season 8 played and the crew is ecstatic.  Uncle Steve has a crazy story about Junior.  Church Complaints is here and have you ever heard of a 15 year old in still stuck in the 4th grade.  Childish Gambino lights up the desert in Coachella.  Junior has Sports Talk.  Morehouse College is making history in 2020.  Today in Closing Remarks, Big Dog talks about fear and more.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
